item.title: Multi Module Dependency - Apache Maven Tutorial â€“ CodeTab
item.description: Multi Module Dependency Management Dependency inheritance (explained in previous chapter) is useful when a dependency is required by all child modules. When a dependency is required by some or even many, but not by all modules, then use dependency management feature. The example code extended-multi, used in this tutorial, is available at GitHub Maven Examples. Download the examples as zip and extract it to some location or clone it with git.
